org.forgerock.opendj.adapter.server2x

Class Adapters

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.opendj.adapter.server2x.Adapters

  • public final class Adapters
extends Object
    This class provides a connection factory and an adapter for the OpenDJ 2.x server.
